name: Furcadia: The Second Dreaming
blurb: Furcadia is the premier Social MMO. Created from players' dreams, millions have already enjoyed it. Now we're making a web version!

rewards.reward: No Reward
Cookie Collector: You get our project newsletter emailed to you weekly, a downloadable Angel Cat coloring page, a special kickstarter Desctag and 5 extra daily cookies for your Furcadia character!
Art Lover: You\u2019ll get to vote on which avatar we will add to the game next! Also includes Cookie Collector rewards.
Design Apprentice: You get to vote on which new game feature we\u2019ll implement next! Also includes Cookie Collector rewards.

AngelCat: Vote on both avatar AND feature, plus you get an AngelCat avatar in Furcadia for a year. This avatar is a Kickstarter exclusive, available only for our backers here! Comes with Cookie Collector rewards as well.

Groundbreaking Settler: New to Furcadia? Start off in style with a Portrait space you can fill with your own art, some edible snacks, and gifts to give friends new or old. You also get a starter guide, links to pre-made portrait art, and a set of wings of your choice for a year! Plus a downloadable PDF Primes coloring/story book, and five Golden DragonScales. Plenty of bang for your buck here!

PlayTester: Get involved in our development process! You get access to every test build, our new Second Dreaming test server, plus a special private forum to discuss it all with us and offer suggestions!  Also comes with our downloadable Primes coloring/story book, and a new color art print by Furcadia co-creator Talzhemir, both in PDF format. Plus five Golden DragonScales and all AngelCat rewards.

Town Cryer: We will make one system announcement of your choice, at the time of your choice, subject to our approval. Get your message across to thousands of people in the game, live! Includes PlayTester Rewards.

Scholarly Scribe: You provide us with art for a custom desctag of your choice. We\u2019ll add it into the game, and it will appear on your character forever! Make a statement about who you are for everyone to see. Includes PlayTester rewards.
ArchangelCat: You get all the goodies in PlayTester, but with the AngelCat avatar for life, or maybe even longer! This Kickstarter exclusive avatar just never expires, ever.
Charming Courtier: Furcadia creators Felorin and Emerald Flame will visit your dream for an evening, socializing and chatting with you and your guests! Includes ArchangelCat rewards.
Kitterdust Enchanter: You get the magical Kitterdust ability for your character. With this power, you can change your size all you want, from tiny to double normal size!  Includes ArchangelCat Level.

Emerald Heart: Emerald Flame will personally perform a Heartbonding Ceremony for you and your dearest friend. Comes with two Heartbonding Desctags, one ArchangelCat reward, and one Bonus Treasure Package (Town Cryer + Scribe + Kitterdust Enchanter).

Silverpelt Noble: You\u2019ll receive Silver Sponsorship for Life, now available for the first time anywhere! We\u2019ll also mail you a signed Pawtograph book, and a limited edition physical copy of our new Second Dreaming color art print by Furcadia co-creator Talzhemir, drawn specially for this Kickstarter. Both the Sponsorship and the print are exclusives, only available here! Includes ArchangelCat rewards, plus five more Golden DragonScales for a total of ten!

Speaker To Dragons: Schedule a one hour Skype video chat with Dr. Cat. He will talk about anything you like, and compose and recite an original limerick about you. You can watch him fold a shiny origami dragon of the color of your choice, which will be mailed to you afterwards! Comes with ArchangelCat rewards with fifteen Golden DragonScales, and Bonus Treasure Package (Town Cryer + Scribe + Kitterdust Enchanter).

Consulting Creator: Design your own game item for Furcadia! Make up an eatable or throwable, write all the custom messages, choose random effects, pick or provide sounds, and we\u2019ll program it into the game!  Wow!  Includes ArchangelCat rewards with twenty Golden DragonScales, and Bonus Treasure Package.

Party Animal: Party in your dream! We will bring as many of our staff to attend all evening as we can gather together, and we\u2019ll announce the party repeatedly to everyone logged into Furcadia to make sure you get a huge crowd! You also get ArchangelCat rewards with twenty-five Golden DragonScales, and Bonus Treasure Package.

Emerald Enchantress: Your choice of Pawfasting or Heartbonding Ceremony & Desctags by Emerald Flame. Comes with two Silver Sponsorships for Life for you and your sweetheart, Two ArchangelCat rewards with a total of thirty Golden DragonScales and a Bonus Treasure Package.

Dauntless Dreamweaver: Often requested, now finally available - you get a Dream Package FOR LIFE! This gets you a reserved main-map portal location to your own dream, for all eternity! Also includes ArchangelCat rewards with forty Golden DragonScales.

Immortal Furcadian: You get all these never-expiring features: Silver Sponsorship for Life, Dream Package for life, Kitterdust Enchanter size-changing power, our AngelCat Desctag, AngelCat avatar for life, a custom Desctag with your own art, and our special Furcadia For Life desctag, plus all other PlayTester rewards with fifty total Golden DragonScales!

Renowned Avatar: You can add any type of character avatar to our game, with art and animation you provide. We add it to Furcadia for your exclusive use! This is the ultimate in personalization, people have been requesting this for over a decade! You also get our Deluxe Treasure Package: Town Cryer, Scholarly Scribe, Kitterdust Enchanter, and ArchangelCat Rewards with fifty Golden DragonScales, plus a handmade origami dragon by Dr. Cat in the color of your choice!

Heroic Avatar: You provide Avatar art that we will add to Furcadia, making your creation a permanent part of our game. Then you can share it with up to ten Furcadia friends, as well as using it yourself! Create a new mythical creature, or a whole new race - your imagination is the only limit! Also includes Deluxe Treasure Package as above, and one hundred Golden DragonScales.

Legendary Avatar: Don't have mad art skills? You describe whatever avatar you want, and one of our talented staff artists will draw and animate your design! Review concept art and request changes. The final result can be either just for you, to share with ten friends, or Free for everyone in Furcadia - it\u2019s your choice! This can have more impact on the game than any of our other rewards, as you see people playing as your creation, roaming everywhere you go! You also receive TWO Deluxe Treasure Packages, and two hundred Golden DragonScales!

Ambassador to Dragons: We will entertain you with an evening of dinner and gaming with our San Francisco team, Gar, Dr. Cat and Emerald Flame! You can pick the game and the restaurant, or we\u2019ll be happy to make recommendations. (Note: You are responsible for your own transportation expenses to get here.) Comes with Three Deluxe Treasure Packages, and a whopping five hundred Golden DragonScales!

Wizened Worldshaper: Make part of our gameworld! YOUR dream will be a permanent part of Furcadia, with its own portal in a prominent location! Host a dueling arena, a puzzle quest, a social hangout, or even build your own RPG!   Also comes with Four Deluxe Treasure Packages, and eight hundred Golden DragonScales!

Exalted DragonLord: You get to work with our staff on the creation of a new main map for the game! You collaborate on planning layout and features. If you want you can also work on map editing, art, scripting, or any other parts of Dreamweaving you have a knack for. When it's finished, a button will be added that teleports players right to the dream you helped build! Comes with Five Deluxe Treasure Packages. (Yes, that means five origami dragons too!) Plus you get a THOUSAND Golden DragonScales!
